attributes.additional_details:
Reading through the list of e-petitions, there are some very curious and in some cases almost frightening suggestions.

I propose that as well as being able to sign a pro-vote in support of an e-petition, there should be an option to sign an anti-vote in opposition to it.

The relative numbers of pro-votes and anti-votes would give a much better indication of the overall opinion of the population than just counting pro-votes, and any petition with more anti-votes than pro-votes could be automatically held to be rejected.
